Uses of Class
java.time.temporal.ValueRange

  • Packages that use ValueRange 
    Package Description
    java.time
    The main API for dates, times, instants, and durations.
    java.time.chrono
    Generic API for calendar systems other than the default ISO.
    java.time.temporal
    Access to date and time using fields and units, and date time adjusters.

    • Uses of ValueRange in java.time.temporal

      Methods in java.time.temporal that return ValueRange 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ValueRange ValueRange.of(long min, long max)
      Obtains a fixed value range.
      static ValueRange ValueRange.of(long min, long maxSmallest, long maxLargest)
      Obtains a variable value range.
      static ValueRange ValueRange.of(long minSmallest, long minLargest, long maxSmallest, long maxLargest)
      Obtains a fully variable value range.
      ValueRange TemporalField.range()
      Gets the range of valid values for the field.
      ValueRange ChronoField.range()
      Gets the range of valid values for the field.
      default ValueRange TemporalAccessor.range(TemporalField field)
      Gets the range of valid values for the specified field.
      ValueRange TemporalField.rangeRefinedBy(TemporalAccessor temporal)
      Get the range of valid values for this field using the temporal object to refine the result.
      ValueRange ChronoField.rangeRefinedBy(TemporalAccessor temporal)
